TaskCenter_OceanExport_NewBooking.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_NewBooking
TaskCenter_OceanExport_NewBooking.BaseCriteria: $@OPD@=0 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@APR@=0 AND $@ContactMail@ LIKE '%%MailSender%' AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@DocByID@ = '%CurrentUser'

TaskCenter_OceanExport_LS.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_LS
TaskCenter_OceanExport_LS.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@RBLD@!=2 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser'' AND $@IsTruck@=1 OR $@IsCustoms@=1

TaskCenter_OceanExport_OnBoard.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_SILS
TaskCenter_OceanExport_OnBoard.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@OnBoard@!=3 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanExport_Bill.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_Bill
TaskCenter_OceanExport_Bill.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@MBLD@=2 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillNot.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillNot
TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillNot.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@ShippingLineID@ IN(''8F09FD42-3BBA-4EA9-BB5B-80E53770CA84'',''91B68E82-32A9-4A41-
8309-20DE34893C25'',''E2D05D39-B9A2-4C7D-838E-C6FA466509EE'',''FC4361F1-FF7A-4B57-B411-99E106D1B7C0'',''6F51BA0E-397C-4AF8
-A453-617B1051E76B'') AND $@IsValid@=1 AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND
$@DocByID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillHave.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillHave
TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillHave.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@ShippingLineID@ IN(''8F09FD42-3BBA-4EA9-BB5B-80E53770CA84'',''91B68E82-32A9-4A41-
8309-20DE34893C25'',''E2D05D39-B9A2-4C7D-838E-C6FA466509EE'',''FC4361F1-FF7A-4B57-B411-99E106D1B7C0'',''6F51BA0E-397C-4AF8
-A453-617B1051E76B'') AND $@IsValid@=1 AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND
$@DocByID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillALL.Name: TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillALL
TaskCenter_OceanExport_FillALL.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@ShippingLineID@ IN(''8F09FD42-3BBA-4EA9-BB5B-80E53770CA84'',''91B68E82-32A9-4A41-
8309-20DE34893C25'',''E2D05D39-B9A2-4C7D-838E-C6FA466509EE'',''FC4361F1-FF7A-4B57-B411-99E106D1B7C0'',''6F51BA0E-397C-4AF8
-A453-617B1051E76B'') AND $@IsValid@=1 AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND
$@DocByID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanImport_TodayDownloaded.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_TodayDownloaded
TaskCenter_OceanImport_TodayDownloaded.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@CreateDate@=CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) AND
$@IsValid@=1 AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='%CurrentUser'

TaskCenter_OceanImport_Notreleasecargo.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_Notreleasecargo
TaskCenter_OceanImport_Notreleasecargo.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@RC@=0 AND $@ANSC@=1 AND $@APCCfm@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''AND $@ARC@=0

TaskCenter_OceanImport_NewRBL.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_NewRBL
TaskCenter_OceanImport_NewRBL.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@RBLD@=1 AND $@RBLRcv@=0 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='%CurrentUser'

TaskCenter_OceanImport_AgreeReleaseCargo.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_AgreeReleaseCargo
TaskCenter_OceanImport_AgreeReleaseCargo.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@RC@=0 AND $@ANSC@=1 AND $@APCCfm@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''AND $@ARC@=1

TaskCenter_OceanImport_LocalService.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_LocalService
TaskCenter_OceanImport_LocalService.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND ($@IsTruck@=1 OR $@IsCustoms@=1) AND $@ANSC@=1 AND
$@IsValid@=1 AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanImport_EmptyTank.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_EmptyTank
TaskCenter_OceanImport_EmptyTank.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@ANSC@=1 AND $@APCCfm@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND $@ECR@=0
AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_OceanImport_Bill.Name: TaskCenter_OceanImport_EmptyTank
TaskCenter_OceanImport_Bill.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@ANSC@=1 AND $@APCCfm@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND $@ECR@=0
AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser''

TaskCenter_US_OceanExport_NewBooking.BaseCriteria: $@OPD@=0 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@APR@=0 AND $@ContactMail@ LIKE '%%MailSender%' AND $@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@DocByID@ = '%CurrentUser'

$@CompanyID@ in (%CurrentCompany) AND $@CustomerServiceID@='+'''%CurrentUser'' AND $@IsTruck@=1 OR $@IsCustoms@=1

TaskCenter_US_OceanExport_OnBoard.BaseCriteria:
$@OPD@=0 AND $@OnBoard@!=3 AND $@SOS@=1 AND $@SOPV@=1 AND $@IsValid@=1 AND
